title: Neptune Vase
description: Neptune Vase; Factory of Geminiano Cozzi (Italian (Venetian), active 1764 - 1812); Venice, Veneto, Italy; vases 1769; lid modern (1800 - 1988); Hybrid soft-paste porcelain; 30 x 26.7 cm (11 13/16 x 10 1/2 in.); 88.DE.9.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
